r.d: Operator overloading for: +, -, *, /, %, <<, >>, ., |, &, ^, ~, !, ++, --, +=, -=, *=, /=, %=, <<=, >>=, .=, |=, &=, ^=, ~=, ==, !=, ===, !==, <, and <= operators. Conditional support for > and >= available with application of a patch.
r.n: Extension updated to be compatible with PHP5.3 and PHP5.4.
